name: Tarjimly
headline: Translating for Humanity
description: Tarjimly is a YC-backed nonprofit (YC W18) that allows anyone to volunteer their language skills to help refugees and immigrants in need.  We connect the world's bilingual speakers with the 23 million refugees struggling to communicate with doctors, lawyers, and NGOs using chat, phone, and video calling.  We're building a new way for the world to help refugees by bridging language gaps.

founders.name: Aziz Alghunaim
founders.description:
Co-founder at Nash. Prior to Nash, I spent a couple of years building Tarjimly (YC W18), a mobile application to connect refugees with real, volunteer translators all over the world. Before that, I was a software engineer at Palantir working on a number of high-volume data problems. I received my Bachelors and Masters in Computer Science in 2015 from MIT.

I love mission-driven work that is coupled with great technical execution. I am in the Bay Area, and love meeting new people, so say hello :)

# Tarjimly
[tɛr -dʒɪm - liː] Verb
Your browser does not support the audio tag. 
Definition: "Translate for me" in Arabic.
We are an award-winning non-profit organisation with the mission of eliminating humanitarian language barriers to improve the lives of refugees and immigrants. We offer free and affordable remote interpretation and translation services available to non-profit organisations, humanitarian volunteers, social workers and direct to refugees and immigrants.
[Translation & Interpretation Services](https://tarjimly.org/</what-we-do/services>)[I want to volunteer](https://tarjimly.org/</get-involved/volunteer>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6365b2055dc3eb14e5b2e061_icons8-google-play.svg)GET IT ONGoogle Play](https://tarjimly.org/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tarjimlymobile&hl=en&gl=US>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/635dee6b0b918d4cbd11a24d_apple.svg)Download on theApp Store](https://tarjimly.org/<https:/apps.apple.com/ng/app/tarjimly/id1438066201>)
[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
#### Click button to play video
The Issue of Language Barriers
There are 30 million refugees globally and 44% of them are unable to speak the same language as the people trying to help them. Language barriers block access to important information and essential services, including medical, legal, psycho-social and educational services.
[volunteer with us](https://tarjimly.org/</get-involved/volunteer>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6446521ca7001ba2bc6ae776_SyrianWomenRefugeeCamp.webp)
Free Services at a Worldwide Scale
Tarjimly's free mobile app connects multi-lingual volunteers who want to donate their time and skills direct to refugees, asylum seekers and humanitarians. We combine the power of technology and community to offer free interpretation and translation at scale. 
[tarjimly essentials](https://tarjimly.org/</what-we-do/tarjimly-essentials>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6425619a1eb7588f1c6f39a9_76354.webp)
Specialised Services for NGOS
Tarjimly offers a wider range of affordable translation and interpretation services exclusively to non-profit actors. Our platinum services offer affordable pricing, flexibility, a focus on hiring refugees, and an understanding of how non-profit organisations function.
[platinum services](https://tarjimly.org/</what-we-do/tarjimly-platinum>)

## Empowering Humanitarians to Amplify Impact
Tarjimly can be used in a wide range of humanitarian settings—from refugee camps and educational institutions to medical clinics and resettlement agencies, in social workers' offices or even during emergency responses.
#### Attentive and Caring
#####  _Our two-year partnership with Tarjimly has been fantastic. Their dedicated and supportive team played a crucial role in assisting our clients' paths to citizenship. We highly value and recommend the Tarjimly team!_
###### **Kristen Bloom, Executive DirectorRefugee Assistance Alliance**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6522ecbe36a7c0b4480bcba2_Welcome.US-Venezuelan-Refugees-0026.webp)
#### A Valuable Tool
#####  _"Tarjimly has been a valuable tool for local volunteers working with Afghan refugees, especially Afghan women who often cannot read their own language. The app allows for communication through a translator, which has been a rewarding experience for volunteers and refugees alike."_
###### **Hilary Hart, Spokane Women Together**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6516f8845b15e70846f3a445_download.webp)
#### Responsive and Professional
#####  _"Tarjimly premium has been a huge help for us, especially for responding to messages and for announcements to the community on our social media channels. All the interpreters I've been connected with have been very responsive and professional, and we received positive feedback on the translations provided. I especially appreciate the wide variety of language and the quick response to requests._
###### **Laira, Programme ManagerIntereuropean Human Aid Association**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65417cbff4af4cc703da851f_WhatsApp%20Image%202023-10-31%20at%2017.39.14_2b6203c5.jpg)
#### An Invaluable Resource
#####  _Our Legal Access Department works to promote people seeking asylum’s access to justice in the UK, supporting people through the difficult process of claiming asylum .... Tarjimly has facilitated almost 1000 conversations with our clients in only the last three months. It has become an invaluable resource which we at Care4Calais rely on every day, often multiple times per day._
###### Hannah Marwood, Legal Access & Guidance Team Manager. Care4Calais
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65417e619f2bb291bce27dc8_Care4Calais.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/637e9bc1130d5632d6ad3a32_Coursy-slider_arrow_left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/637e9bc1130d56c3a2ad3a31_Coursy-slider_arrow_right.svg)
## Impact on Humanitarians
Tarjimly aids both volunteer and professional humanitarians by enabling them to:
  * Save time
  * Serve more people
  * Serve marginalised communities
  * Speak directly to the communities they serve


[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
## Volunteer with Tarjimly!
# "
“Farahnaz was sponsored by a volunteer circle in the US, but they couldn't afford to hire an interpreter. Luckily I was available to interpret for her about the steps needed for enrolling her children in a local school and accessing food stamp benefits."
**In as little as 10 minutes** , you can assist refugees and immigrants in**accessing vital information** , whether it's about a medical appointment or navigating to the city center** _Volunteering is accessible and flexible_** , with no minimum time commitment. All you need is a smartphone and internet access. You'll **get a notification** when someone needs your help. Simply click 'Yes' to connect securely through the Tarjimly app, with no personal contact details exchanged.
[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6527f06513838166774792b0_HIPAA-COMPLIANT.png)
### Tarjimly is HIPAA compliant
Tarjimly maintains strict industry-standard data security protocols for all user data, in accordance with HIPAA regulations. We have dedicated staff focused on ensuring that the privacy and security of user and conversation data are maintained at all times.
## Why Choose Human Interpreters Over AI Translations?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c8f1ae13d14fc9c2e6_Frame%203.svg)
#### Risk of Errors
Machine translations are not yet flawless, and small mistakes can be costly in critical situations like medical or legal consults. Human interpreters can clarify context and ensure accurate understanding to avoid such risks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c89e8ae5ccae4601a6_Frame%202.svg)
#### **The Language Gap**
Machine translations often lack support for lesser-known languages and dialects like Dari—a dialect of Farsi predominantly spoken in Afghanistan—and Sango, spoken in the Central African Republic, widening the gap in language services.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c887e2e1692bd95713_Frame%201.svg)
#### Cultural and Contextual Understanding
Human interpreters can rephrase and repeat sentences to ensure comprehension, whilst adapting messages to be culturally appropriate and handling sensitive conversations with empathy.
## Our Partners
Our work is supported by multiple generous donors and partners in the technology and humanitarian sectors. Tarjimly is bridging communities with technology, talent, and financial support.
[partner with us](https://tarjimly.org/</what-we-do/partnership>)

# Tarjimly
[tɛr -dʒɪm - liː] Verb
Your browser does not support the audio tag. 
Definition: "Translate for me" in Arabic.
We are an award-winning non-profit organisation with the mission of eliminating humanitarian language barriers to improve the lives of refugees and immigrants. We offer free and affordable remote interpretation and translation services available to non-profit organisations, humanitarian volunteers, social workers and direct to refugees and immigrants.
Translation & Interpretation Services⟨5⟩I want to volunteer⟨14⟩![⟨20⟩GET IT ONGoogle Play](https://tarjimly.org/<https:/play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tarjimlymobile&hl=en&gl=US>)![⟨21⟩Download on theApp Store](https://tarjimly.org/<https:/apps.apple.com/ng/app/tarjimly/id1438066201>)
[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
#### Click button to play video
The Issue of Language Barriers
There are 30 million refugees globally and 44% of them are unable to speak the same language as the people trying to help them. Language barriers block access to important information and essential services, including medical, legal, psycho-social and educational services.
volunteer with us⟨14⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6446521ca7001ba2bc6ae776_SyrianWomenRefugeeCamp.webp)
Free Services at a Worldwide Scale
Tarjimly's free mobile app connects multi-lingual volunteers who want to donate their time and skills direct to refugees, asylum seekers and humanitarians. We combine the power of technology and community to offer free interpretation and translation at scale. 
tarjimly essentials⟨6⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6425619a1eb7588f1c6f39a9_76354.webp)
Specialised Services for NGOS
Tarjimly offers a wider range of affordable translation and interpretation services exclusively to non-profit actors. Our platinum services offer affordable pricing, flexibility, a focus on hiring refugees, and an understanding of how non-profit organisations function.

## Empowering Humanitarians to Amplify Impact
Tarjimly can be used in a wide range of humanitarian settings—from refugee camps and educational institutions to medical clinics and resettlement agencies, in social workers' offices or even during emergency responses.
#### Attentive and Caring
#####  _Our two-year partnership with Tarjimly has been fantastic. Their dedicated and supportive team played a crucial role in assisting our clients' paths to citizenship. We highly value and recommend the Tarjimly team!_
###### **Kristen Bloom, Executive DirectorRefugee Assistance Alliance**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6522ecbe36a7c0b4480bcba2_Welcome.US-Venezuelan-Refugees-0026.webp)
#### A Valuable Tool
#####  _"Tarjimly has been a valuable tool for local volunteers working with Afghan refugees, especially Afghan women who often cannot read their own language. The app allows for communication through a translator, which has been a rewarding experience for volunteers and refugees alike."_
###### **Hilary Hart, Spokane Women Together**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6516f8845b15e70846f3a445_download.webp)
#### Responsive and Professional
#####  _"Tarjimly premium has been a huge help for us, especially for responding to messages and for announcements to the community on our social media channels. All the interpreters I've been connected with have been very responsive and professional, and we received positive feedback on the translations provided. I especially appreciate the wide variety of language and the quick response to requests._
###### **Laira, Programme ManagerIntereuropean Human Aid Association**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65417cbff4af4cc703da851f_WhatsApp%20Image%202023-10-31%20at%2017.39.14_2b6203c5.jpg)
#### An Invaluable Resource
#####  _Our Legal Access Department works to promote people seeking asylum’s access to justice in the UK, supporting people through the difficult process of claiming asylum .... Tarjimly has facilitated almost 1000 conversations with our clients in only the last three months. It has become an invaluable resource which we at Care4Calais rely on every day, often multiple times per day._
###### Hannah Marwood, Legal Access & Guidance Team Manager. Care4Calais
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65417e619f2bb291bce27dc8_Care4Calais.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/637e9bc1130d5632d6ad3a32_Coursy-slider_arrow_left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/637e9bc1130d56c3a2ad3a31_Coursy-slider_arrow_right.svg)
## Impact on Humanitarians
Tarjimly aids both volunteer and professional humanitarians by enabling them to:
  * Save time
  * Serve more people
  * Serve marginalised communities
  * Speak directly to the communities they serve


[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
## Volunteer with Tarjimly!
# "
“Farahnaz was sponsored by a volunteer circle in the US, but they couldn't afford to hire an interpreter. Luckily I was available to interpret for her about the steps needed for enrolling her children in a local school and accessing food stamp benefits."
**In as little as 10 minutes** , you can assist refugees and immigrants in**accessing vital information** , whether it's about a medical appointment or navigating to the city center** _Volunteering is accessible and flexible_** , with no minimum time commitment. All you need is a smartphone and internet access. You'll **get a notification** when someone needs your help. Simply click 'Yes' to connect securely through the Tarjimly app, with no personal contact details exchanged.
[](https://tarjimly.org/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/6527f06513838166774792b0_HIPAA-COMPLIANT.png)
### Tarjimly is HIPAA compliant
Tarjimly maintains strict industry-standard data security protocols for all user data, in accordance with HIPAA regulations. We have dedicated staff focused on ensuring that the privacy and security of user and conversation data are maintained at all times.
## Why Choose Human Interpreters Over AI Translations?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c8f1ae13d14fc9c2e6_Frame%203.svg)
#### Risk of Errors
Machine translations are not yet flawless, and small mistakes can be costly in critical situations like medical or legal consults. Human interpreters can clarify context and ensure accurate understanding to avoid such risks.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c89e8ae5ccae4601a6_Frame%202.svg)
#### **The Language Gap**
Machine translations often lack support for lesser-known languages and dialects like Dari—a dialect of Farsi predominantly spoken in Afghanistan—and Sango, spoken in the Central African Republic, widening the gap in language services.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ebea99d6671b2fe6fc5043/65b434c887e2e1692bd95713_Frame%201.svg)
#### Cultural and Contextual Understanding
Human interpreters can rephrase and repeat sentences to ensure comprehension, whilst adapting messages to be culturally appropriate and handling sensitive conversations with empathy.
## Our Partners
Our work is supported by multiple generous donors and partners in the technology and humanitarian sectors. Tarjimly is bridging communities with technology, talent, and financial support.

generated_description:
### Tarjimly: Translating for Humanity

**Overview:**
Founded in 2017 and a proud Y Combinator W18 alumni, Tarjimly is a nonprofit based in Mountain View that has one clear mission: eliminating language barriers for refugees and immigrants worldwide. Their motto, "Translating for Humanity," encapsulates their goal to enable communication for the 23 million refugees who struggle to navigate critical services like healthcare and legal aid.

**How It Works:**
Tarjimly leverages the skills of bilingual volunteers through a free mobile app, connecting them directly with those in need of translation and interpretation support. These interactions occur via chat, phone, or video calls, helping refugees and asylum seekers communicate effectively. Their services are not just limited to individuals; they also cater to NGOs, providing specialized, affordable translation services that prioritize hiring refugees themselves.

**Team and Impact:**
Despite a small team of four, Tarjimly has managed to make significant strides in humanitarian assistance. They’ve established a community of volunteers ready to assist in real-time, ensuring that vital information reaches the people who need it most. Their recent 2023 Impact Report showcases their growth and the effectiveness of their platform.

**Why Tarjimly?**
1. **Direct Connection:** Human interpreters can navigate the nuances of conversation, ensuring that critical information isn’t lost—a limitation often found in machine translations.
   
2. **Cultural Sensitivity:** The app’s human-driven support helps close cultural gaps, fostering understanding and empathy in sensitive situations.

3. **Flexibility for Volunteers:** Anyone with a smartphone and internet connection can volunteer their time without minimum time commitments. You simply respond to requests as they come in.

4. **Broad Reach:** From refugee camps to resettlement agencies, Tarjimly's services enhance communication across varied humanitarian settings. 

**Get Involved:**
Volunteers are always welcome at Tarjimly, and their need for more bilingual speakers is ongoing. Supporting Tarjimly can happen in several ways—volunteering, partnering, or making a donation.

**Conclusion:**
In a world rife with communication barriers, Tarjimly stands as a beacon of hope and understanding. They're not just translating words; they're translating lives and opportunities for a brighter future for refugees worldwide. If you're bilingual and interested in making a tangible impact, Tarjimly is your venue. Check out their work at [tarjimly.org](https://tarjimly.org).
